alert.note: Alert for Walworth (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 11:21PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Walworth County through 1145 PM CDT... At 1121 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Delavan, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Elkhorn, Delavan, Lake Geneva, Williams Bay, Walworth, Fontana-On-Geneva Lake, Darien, Como, Springfield, Delavan Lake, and Millard. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 12 between mile markers 320 and 331. Interstate 43 between mile markers 15 and 30. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
